content.question: St. Teresa’s discussion of God’s attitude toward women best reflects

choices.label: Protestant views of the community of believers
the doctrine that scripture is the sole source of religious authority
debates during the Reformation regarding proper gender roles
the continued exclusion of women from positions of political authority

content.answer: debates during the Reformation regarding proper gender roles

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify  a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience.
